nodes.text: CoreWorld Capital was a supposed investing firm that employed droid investors during the Third Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The firm marketed itself as "five-star" and said that they would earn their clients "big money."

CoreWorld Capital was mentioned in the 2019 expansion Onslaught to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by the company BioWare. In the Imperial Saboteur storyline, where the player secretly works with the Galactic Republic, the Commander receives a message from the supposed firm, which can be decrypted as "Got Message From Droid Good Information Talk Soon" when only reading the words beginning with capital letters.
